input.activity_signal: Company website found via search (https://www.telesmart.io/) showing current operations as "Automated Global Number Operations for Carriers", CBInsights profile indicates active telecommunications operations with API-driven platform, and Tracxn profile dated May 12, 2025 shows active business status
input.product_summary: Telesmart provides API-driven, white-label platform that automates telecommunications supply chain services including global number lifecycle management, voice and SMS messaging services, inventory management, porting, routing, and switching for carriers and businesses.
